This was worth a tapas stop near the Barceloneta.  The guy behind the counter deafeningly yells out your order and it is a busy place with mostly a long counter for seating.  Both the locals and tourists seem to equally know about this place.  The foie gras was a steal at 9 eu!  Loved the anchovies, olives, cheese and shishito peppers.  This place would definitely be in my book to come back to, especially for that foie gras!
